content.title: President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai'
content.cardText: Cultural and project manager, civic activist, President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai', founder of the art space 'Pich', director of festivals 'Air Fest', 'Ticket to the Sun'

content.title: Vice President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai'
content.cardText: Cultural and project manager, civic activist, Vice President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai', co-founder of the art space 'Pich', program director of festivals 'Air Fest', 'Ticket to the Sun'

content.title: Vice President of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai'
content.cardText: Actor, member of NGO 'Artistic Association 'Plai', co-founder and art director of the art space 'Pich', theatrical curator of festivals 'Air Fest', 'Ticket to the Sun'
Communicator of projects of the organization 'Artistic Association 'PLAY', cultural space 'PICH', target specialist.
Designer of projects of the organization 'Art Association 'PLAY', administrator of the art space 'PICH' and the art shop.
